items.name: Version 1.2: In the Turquoise Moonglow Patch Notes
items.description: Thank you for your steadfast support! We are excited to announce that Version 1.2 In the Turquoise Moonglow will be available soon!

items.name: Depths of Illusive Realm - Dreams Ablaze in Darkness
Depths of Illusive Realm - Dreams Ablaze in Darkness
items.description: Astrite x1000, Malleable Elite Class Echo I x1, Malleable Elite Class Echo II x1, Premium Tuner x360, Premium Sealed Tube x36 and other development materials.

items.name: Depths of Illusive Realm - Dreams Ablaze in Darkness
items.description: New Content "Carnival in Slumberland" Open! Phantom Echo: Dreamless and new Metaphors will be available for you to select.

items.name: Intensive Training - Limited Time EXP Material Double Drop Event
[Bountiful Crescendo] Leveling Material Double Drop Event
items.description: Consume Wavesplates to claim double rewards when completing [Simulation Challenge] and [Forgery Challenge].

items.name: [Bountiful Crescendo] Leveling Material Double Drop Event
items.description: Consume Wavesplates to claim double rewards when completing [Simulation Challenge] and [Forgery Challenge].

items.name: Overdash Club
items.description: Consume Waveplates to claim double rewards when completing the "Tacet Suppression" challenge.

items.name: "Chord Cleansing" LT Echo Double Drop Event
items.description: Consume Waveplates to claim double rewards when completing the "Tacet Suppression" challenge.

items.name: "Chord Cleansing" LT Echo Double Drop Event
items.description: Consume Waveplates to claim double rewards when completing the "Tacet Suppression" challenge.

items.name: "Chord Cleansing" LT Echo Double Drop Event
items.description: Consume Waveplates to claim double rewards when completing the "Tacet Suppression" challenge.

items.name: Second Coming of Solaris
items.description: Accept Maqi's daily commission and retrieve the items requested for rewards.

items.name: Lollo Campaign: Limited-time Commission Event
items.description: Complete tasks in [Lollo Campaign] to earn Lollo Stamps. Lollo Stamps can be used in the roulette of "Lollo Helper" to get random rewards.

items.name: Reprise Of Tides
items.description: After Version 1.2 Update, eligible returning Rovers can claim corresponding rewards via either completing check-in or event tasks.

items.name: "By Moon's Grace" Moon-Chasing Festival
items.description: The Moon-Chasing Festival is a Huanglong traditional festival that features various origin stories, with the most popular being the tale of The Fox and the Moon. On this special night, families and friends come together to admire the moon and make wishes, expressing their hopes for a brighter future.

items.name: Alloy Smelt - Limited Time Battle Event
Tactical Simulacra: Limited-time Battle Challenge
items.description: Head to a special Sonoro Sphere where you'll be able to release your battle strength with diverse team compositions and corresponding buffs.

items.name: Wuthering Exploration
items.description: Complete Exploration Quests daily to get Exploration Points and claim rewards after achieving Exploration Point milestones.

items.name: Do Echoids Dream Of Electric Sleep?
items.description: Complete Exploration Quests daily to get Exploration Points and claim rewards after achieving Exploration Point milestones.

items.name: Absolute Pulsation - Jinhsi - Ages of Harvest
items.description: During the event, boosted drop rates for 5-Star Weapon: Ages of Harvest, 4-Star Weapons: Discord, Commando of Conviction, and Amity Accord!

items.name: Thawborn Renewal - Jinhsi
items.description: During the event, boosted drop rates for 5-Star Resonator: Jinhsi, 4-Star Resonators: Sanhua, Danjin, and Yangyang!

items.name: Absolute Pulsation - Jinlin - Stringmaster
items.description: During the event, boosted drop rates for 5-star Weapon [Stringmaster], 4-star Weapons [Jinzhou Keeper], [Cadenza], and [Lunar Cutter]!
